parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The new description of the diagnostic metric set.

parameters.name: MetricIds
parameters.description: The ID of diagnostic metric N.

parameters.name: MetricSetId
parameters.description: The ID of the diagnostic metric set.

parameters.name: MetricSetName
parameters.description: The new name of the diagnostic metric set.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the diagnostic metric set. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
